Interface ParserInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractParser, ListParser

    public interface ParserInterface

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExpressionInterface parse(String expression)
      Parse an expression.
      ExpressionInterface parse(String expression, LexerInterface lexer)
      Parse an expression using a specific lexer.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        ExpressionInterface parse(String expression)
        Parse an expression.
        Parameters:
        expression - The expression to parse.
        Returns:
        The parsed expression.
        Throws:
        ParseException - if the expression is invalid.

      • parse

        ExpressionInterface parse(String expression,
                        LexerInterface lexer)
        Parse an expression using a specific lexer.
        Parameters:
        expression - The expression to parse.
        lexer - The lexer to use to tokenise the string.
        Returns:
        The parsed expression.
        Throws:
        ParseException - if the expression is invalid.

      • parseTokens

        ExpressionInterface parseTokens(Collection<Token> tokens)
        Parse an expression that has already beed tokenized.
        Parameters:
        tokens - The collection of tokens that form the expression.
        Returns:
        The parsed expression.
        Throws:
        ParseException - if the expression is invalid.
